<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shooting Stars Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5988) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=701" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 120 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Monastic Weaponry](/Feats.aspx?ID=5979)

</column>

---

You enter a stance that lets you throw [shuriken](/Weapons.aspx?ID=439) with lightning speed. While in this stance, you can use your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719) attacks with shuriken instead.
name: Shooting Stars Stance
